00019 #if !defined(_BOTBESTPUSHESS_MATRIX_H_)
00020 #define _BOTBESTPUSHESS_MATRIX_H_
00021 
00022 template <class T>
00023 class BotBestPushesS_Matrix {
00024 public:
00025         BotBestPushesS_Matrix();
00026         BotBestPushesS_Matrix(int rows, int columns);
00027         BotBestPushesS_Matrix(const BotBestPushesS_Matrix<T> &other);
00028         BotBestPushesS_Matrix<T> & operator= (const BotBestPushesS_Matrix<T> &other);
00029         ~BotBestPushesS_Matrix();
00030         // all operations except product modify the matrix in-place.
00031         void resize(int rows, int columns);
00032         void identity(void);
00033         void clear(void);
00034         T& operator () (int x, int y);
00035         T trace(void);
00036         BotBestPushesS_Matrix<T>& transpose(void);
00037         BotBestPushesS_Matrix<T> product(BotBestPushesS_Matrix<T> &other);
00038         int minsize(void) {
00039                 return ((m_rows < m_columns) ? m_rows : m_columns);
00040         }
00041         int columns(void) {
00042                 return m_columns;
00043         }
00044         int rows(void) {
00045                 return m_rows;
00046         }
00047 private:
00048         T **m_matrix;
00049         int m_rows;
00050         int m_columns;
00051 };
00052
